timeline.message: add plagiarism check for programming exercises using JPlag

timeline.author: jpbernius

timeline.bodyText: If I run this while an exercise is still open: Would this discard changes in the online code editor?
timeline.author: jpbernius

replies.bodyText: no, this is done in a separate path REPO_DOWNLOAD_CLONE_PATH
replies.author: krusche

timeline.author: jpbernius
jpbernius

implement suggestions in PR reviews. Thank you
